Gang, I love this tsuba that Ron put up on his website, and am dearly
annoyed that I did (do) not have any money to buy it at the moment. 
 
http://nihontophile.com/html/dragon_tsuba.html
 
However I would like to ask the experts if this tsuba was made for a
sword with bo-hi, since the insides of the nakago ana are 'indented' at
the moment ?
 
- Matt
